```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr) 
library(gapminder)
```



```{r}
library(raster)
library(rgdal)
liveData <- raster("data/HARV_dsmCrop.tif")

```

```{r}
summary(liveData)
```

```{r}
str(liveData)
```

```{r}
liveData <- as.data.frame(liveData,xy=TRUE)
ggplot() + geom_raster(data=liveData, aes(x=x, y=y, fill=HARV_dsmCrop))
 scale_fill_viridis_c()
```

dspg 2022

```{r}
library(raster)
library(rgdal)
```

```{r}
HARV_data <- raster("data/HARV_dsmCrop.tif")
```

```{r}
str(HARV_data)
```

```{r}
HARV_data <- as.data.frame(HARV_data,xy=TRUE) 
```

```{r}
ggplot(HARV_data) + geom_boxplot(aes(x=x,y=y))
```
